title: Admin Player Management with Re-Invite System
description: Create an admin page that lists all players with search capability, clickable player cards leading to a player admin detail page. The detail page includes a 'Copy New Invite Link' button that generates a special re-invite URL. When recipients click this link, they can reset their password and regain access to old accounts.

requirements.detail: Admin players page lists all players with search field at the top
Player list shows clickable player cards displaying username, level, and last active time
Player list sorted by last active (most recent first) by default
Admin pages require adminlevel > 0 to access
Player admin detail page shows comprehensive player info (all DB fields, games played, achievements, level, XP, wins/losses, etc.)
Detail page has 'Copy New Invite Link' button
Button generates new GUID and copies re-invite URL to clipboard
Re-invite link route (farkledice.com/reinvite.php?token=[guid]) loads password reset page
Reset page shows username and password input field
Password reset updates the user's password in database
After successful password reset, user is auto-logged in
Create reusable PlayerCard component/template for consistent display across pages

tasks.description: Add reinvite_token (VARCHAR 64) and reinvite_expires (TIMESTAMP) columns to farkle_players table in database schema
Create reusable PlayerCard Smarty template component (templates/farkle_playercard.tpl) showing username, level, last active
Create admin players list page (wwwroot/admin/adminPlayers.php) with search, pagination, and player cards sorted by last active
Create admin player detail page (wwwroot/admin/adminPlayerDetail.php) showing all player info and 'Copy New Invite Link' button
Create AJAX endpoint to generate new reinvite token, store with 7-day expiry, return URL for clipboard copy
Create re-invite password reset page (wwwroot/reinvite.php) that validates token and shows password form
Implement password update logic with auto-login after successful reset
[ORCHESTRATOR] Final verification - verify all requirements are satisfied
tasks.note: All 13 requirements satisfied. All 7 implementation tasks completed.
